page.title: 11THE DUN COW
page.content: The Dun Cow public house is named after the red Lincolnshire cow it has been here since 1500. Inside they have got two gambling machines and two cigarette machines . They can seat 60 people and they sell beers,wine and spirits and bar snacks .Opening times are 11.00hrs to 15.00hrs and in the evening 18.00hrs to 23.30hrs.There are 4 darts teams and 6 people work there.The beer is stored in a cellar under the ground and the drinks are delivered in a lorry called a DREY. Children are only allowed in the pub with their parents or when they use the beer garden outside the back. You are only allowed to drink alcohol when you are 18 or over.The special occasiones at the pub are Christmas Eve, New Year, Bonfire Night Party. On these nights people come and help them celebrate.
